templates.title: Upload file to Blender-Exchange
templates.message: While detailed descriptions and screenshots are helpful, some issues might require manual investigation. Please consider sharing your .blend file with use, you can do so by uploading it to [Blend-Exchange](https://blend-exchange.com/) and add the provided text into your post.

templates.title: Crash report
templates.message: Crashes should be reported on the official bug tracker, you can open a pre-filled bug report using Blender's menu Help > Report A bug. I also highly suggest you to visit [Troubleshooting > Crashes â€” Blender Manual](https://docs.blender.org/manual/en/latest/troubleshooting/crash.html)
